history.proof: intros. exists s; exists p. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule H : s \\In Coh W H0 : safe p sc s H1 : good p sc Unable to unify "s \\In Coh W" with "pstep s p sc s p".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc this W A
sc: schedule

Goal:
s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A), pstep s p sc s' p'

Premises:
pstep : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
good : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> Prop
Inductive schedule : Set := ActStep : schedule | SeqRet : schedule | SeqStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectRet : schedule | WithInvStep : schedule -> schedule | WithInvRet : schedule
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule |- Type] ?T' : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule |- Type] ?f : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule |- ?T'] ?s : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc this W A sc : schedule |- seq ?T]
pstep_safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
step : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc this W A
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)
hooks_frame : forall (U W : world) (K : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid), hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> l \in dom s -> s \In Coh U -> s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> not_hooked_by K l -> all_hooks_fire U l st s n msg to -> all_hooks_fire (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) l st (s \+ s') n msg to
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
inject_frame : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \+ s \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> world_not_hooked U K -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
inject_step : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (s1' s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), valid (U \+ W) -> s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step W this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
Rely.rely_refl : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s : state), s \In Coh w -> Rely.network_rely w this s s
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
ProtocolWithInvariant.stIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), s \In ProtocolWithInvariant.sts ii -> ProtocolWithInvariant.snd_transI (ProtocolWithInvariant.st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
coh_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (s : state), s \In Coh (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> s \In Coh U
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
Actions.a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
projectSE : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> s = projectS W1 s \+ projectS W2 s
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
Rely.network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, Rely.network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
ProtocolWithInvariant.rtIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (r : ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I), r \In ProtocolWithInvariant.rts ii -> ProtocolWithInvariant.rcv_transI (ProtocolWithInvariant.rt_inv (r:=r)) \In rcv_trans (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
cohH : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup

``` 
intros.
intros H1 H2 H3.
unfold safe in H2.
unfold good in H3.
exists s; exists p.
apply H. assumption. all: assumption.
```

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. unfold safe in H2. unfold good in H3. exists s; exists p. apply H. auto. all: auto.
